attributes.action: Investigate UHCW NHS Trust's actions replacing volunteers with private contracts
attributes.additional_details: Whilst the service that Warwickshire and Solihull Blood Bikes perform is only part of the overall contract awarded, omission of this element from a commercial contract would save the NHS an enormous amount of money.
attributes.background: Warwickshire and Solihull Blood Bikes deliver blood and other emergency supplies outside of regular working hours for the UHCW NHS Trust for FREE. Parliament needs to force the Trust to justify why they dropped this 1st class service in favour of a contract that will cost the NHS thousands.
